movie_title: Ways to live for 100 years ⏲️ 6 Minute English
introduction: More and more people are living to 100, but what is the secret of a long life? Beth and Neil discuss

vocabulary.definition: a person who is a hundred years old or older
vocabulary.example: The nursing home celebrated the birthday of their oldest resident, a centenarian who turned 102.

vocabulary.definition: a person who tends to be more reserved or solitary in social situations
vocabulary.example: Being an introvert, she prefers spending quiet evenings at home rather than going to parties.

vocabulary.definition: a person who is outgoing and enjoys being around other people
vocabulary.example: His extrovert personality makes him the life of the party wherever he goes.

vocabulary.definition: resisting or challenging something such as aging or death
vocabulary.example: By staying active and healthy, she was defying the odds and aging gracefully.

vocabulary.definition: a person who has reached adulthood but acts immature and avoids adult responsibilities
vocabulary.example: His constant partying and lack of commitment to work indicated he was suffering from Peter Pan Syndrome.

vocabulary.definition: describing something that is well-known and often based on myths or stories
vocabulary.example: The legendary sword of King Arthur was said to have magical powers.
